course_title: Contextual Education Elective: Faith & Justice in the Prophets
class_notes: (Concurrent Enrollment in CE 552b/ANGb/TPb required; permission number is required to enroll and should be requested by emailing candlerregistrar@emory.edu beginning April 8, 2020 at 7:00 am) (ON-CAMPUS; students who get a permission number to enroll and wish to take the class via live remote synchronous participation  must request permission of the instructor by emailing jbkemp@emory.edu)
course_description: Contextual Education Elective for students in Con Ed II, Teaching Parish II, or EASP II and focused on themes of faith and justice within the prophetic books of the Old Testament.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:20pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_501
sections: Class Nbr: 5319, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:20p, Instructor: J. Kemp, Status: Open
